EmailTemplate.description: Email Templates For Tool Access Changes
EmailTemplate.name: DeniedTool Email Templates_Archive
EmailTemplate.subject: MyAerospace Application Access Denied
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MyAerospace Application Access Denied
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Your request for the following online application has been denied.
{!Contact.TOOLNAME1__c} {!Contact.Tool_Description__c}
Note:
This email is being sent from an unmonitored mailbox. If you need further assistance, please contact a customer support team member at:
1-800-601-3099 US / Canada (Toll Free) 1-602-365-3099 International Choose Option 7 (Web Support)
Thank You, Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support Team
